## ApplyFiltersButton() function

Runs a vertical search. By default has `position: sticky` styling that anchors it to the bottom of the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ApplyFiltersButton({ customCssClasses, label }: ApplyFiltersButtonProps): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { customCssClasses, label } | [ApplyFiltersButtonProps](./answers-react-components.applyfiltersbuttonprops.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element

## Remarks

This is intended to be used when `searchOnChange` field is set to false on all the Facets/StaticFilters components.
